name: SmartCoffee
short_description:
Landaulet includes front-end and beck-end site for good/service order/response for m-commerce in-house application such as coffee house/restaurant/hotel... 
Software as a Service (SaaS)
2D webcam gesture control will due soon.....

if life is a game so be fair play! 


On the Occasion of my 40'th Anniversary: officially announce the Publicly launch of The Open Source Project 'SmartCoffee?' at Google Code for Educational purpose. This is a DIY project finished since 2009 (true Rapid Application Development without any bolstering GUI web framework) that had been put to business but proof to be unsuccessful in term of financial! Technical student or anyone interested can download a copy of source code here or http://download.cnet.com/windows/nguyenluongsonsoft/3260-20_4-6287781.html ...... For sponsors, donors, technical matter, please contact the Author 
https://sourceforge.net/projects/wallpaperlivesyncpcbingandroid/
